所有程序包的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • GameDriver,
  • Library,
  • UserInterface

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library.Bomb
      • UserInterface.ProduceBombs
    • UserInterface.CheckSquare
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton (implements java.awt.ItemSelectable, javax.swing.SwingConstants)
            • javax.swing.JButton (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
              • UserInterface.GameSquare
                • UserInterface.SmartSquare (implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, Library.TimeChecker)
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • UserInterface.GameBoard (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
              • UserInterface.Menu (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
    • GameDriver.Driver

接口分层结构

  • Library.TimeChecker
